QuestData.Title: Return to Sender
QuestData.Description: You've arrived just in time!$B$BUnlike the mail as of late, I'm afraid.$B$BWe are severely understaffed, and demand is at an all-time high. We simply can't keep up!$B$BI'd love to chat, but I need help catching up before I can rest for even a moment.$B$BFirst thing's first. Several parcels of rejected mail have broken loose again; will you help me round them all up and return them to their senders?
